chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following problem:

I received the phone with cracks on the sides and it's too small for me, so I'd like to change it and take another one in good condition and larger.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

I hope my message finds you perfectly healthy.

Customer sends device for refund.

Thanks for doing the right thing.

Kind regards,

Jacques-Elie from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and await arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
SY
